word: IT SHOULD BE OBSERVED THAT ALTHOUGH MRS. WHITE NEVER REQUESTED THE REPRINTING OF THESE ARTICLES, THEY WERE REPUBLISHED IN SHORT INSTALLMENTS IN THE REVIEW AND HERALD IN 1899 AND 1900. THE LATER, FULLER ELLEN G. WHITE PRESENTATIONS ON THE SUBJECT OF HEALTH, CLIMAXED BY THE MINISTRY OF HEALING IN 1905, TOOK THE PLACE OF MANY EARLIER ARTICLES, INCLUDING THE "DISEASE AND ITS CAUSES" SERIES.
